00063 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00064 #include <config.h>
00065 #include <stdio.h>
00066 #include <library/l_alloc_new.h>
00067 #include <library/stack.h>
00068 
00069 static L_Alloc_Pool *stackPool = NULL;
00070 static L_Alloc_Pool *stackElmtPool = NULL;
00071 
00072 Stack *
00073 New_Stack (void)
00074 {
00075   Stack *stack;
00076 
00077   if (stackPool == NULL)
00078     {
00079       stackPool = L_create_alloc_pool ("Stack", sizeof (Stack), 32);
00080       stackElmtPool =
00081         L_create_alloc_pool ("StackElmt", sizeof (StackElmt), 512);
00082     }
00083 
00084   stack = (Stack *) L_alloc (stackPool);
00085 
00086   stack->ptr = NULL;
00087   stack->top = NULL;
00088   stack->bottom = NULL;
00089 
00090   return (stack);
00091 }
00092 
00093 StackElmt *
00094 New_Stack_Elmt (void)
00095 {
00096   return ((StackElmt *) L_alloc (stackElmtPool));
00097 }
00098 
00099 void
00100 Free_Stack_Elmt (StackElmt * ptr)
00101 {
00102   L_free (stackElmtPool, ptr);
00103 }
00104 
00105 Stack *
00106 Free_Stack (Stack * stack)
00107 {
00108   StackElmt *next;
00109   StackElmt *ptr = stack->top;
00110 
00111   while (ptr != NULL)
00112     {
00113       next = ptr->next;
00114       L_free (stackElmtPool, ptr);
00115       ptr = next;
00116     }
00117   L_free (stackPool, stack);
00118   return (NULL);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void
00122 Clear_Stack (Stack * stack)
00123 {
00124   StackElmt *next;
00125   StackElmt *ptr;
00126 
00127   if (stack == NULL)
00128     return;
00129 
00130   ptr = stack->top;
00131   while (ptr != NULL)
00132     {
00133       next = ptr->next;
00134       L_free (stackElmtPool, ptr);
00135       ptr = next;
00136     }
00137 
00138   stack->top = stack->bottom = NULL;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void
00142 Push_Top (Stack * stack, void *ptr)
00143 {
00144   StackElmt *elmt = (StackElmt *) L_alloc (stackElmtPool);
00145   elmt->ptr = ptr;
00146 
00147   if (stack->top != NULL)
00148     {
00149       stack->top->prev = elmt;
00150       elmt->next = stack->top;
00151       elmt->prev = NULL;
00152       stack->top = elmt;
00153     }
00154   else
00155     {
00156       stack->top = elmt;
00157       stack->bottom = elmt;
00158       elmt->prev = NULL;
00159       elmt->next = NULL;
00160     }
00161 }
00162 
00163 void
00164 Push_Bot (Stack * stack, void *ptr)
00165 {
00166   StackElmt *elmt = (StackElmt *) L_alloc (stackElmtPool);
00167   elmt->ptr = ptr;
00168 
00169   if (stack->top != NULL)
00170     {
00171       stack->bottom->next = elmt;
00172       elmt->next = NULL;
00173       elmt->prev = stack->bottom;
00174       stack->bottom = elmt;
00175     }
00176   else
00177     {
00178       stack->top = elmt;
00179       stack->bottom = elmt;
00180       elmt->prev = NULL;
00181       elmt->next = NULL;
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void *
00186 Pop (Stack * stack)
00187 {
00188   StackElmt *pop;
00189   void *ptr;
00190 
00191   if (stack->top != NULL)
00192     {
00193       pop = stack->top;
00194       stack->top = stack->top->next;
00195       if (stack->top)
00196         stack->top->prev = NULL;
00197       else
00198         stack->bottom = NULL;
00199       ptr = pop->ptr;
00200       L_free (stackElmtPool, pop);
00201       return (ptr);
00202     }
00203   return ((void *) -1);
00204 }
00205 
00206 void *
00207 Stack_Top (Stack * stack)
00208 {
00209   if (stack->top != NULL)
00210     return (stack->top->ptr);
00211   else
00212     return ((void *) -1);
00213 }
00214 
00215 void *
00216 Stack_Elmt_Data (StackElmt * elmt)
00217 {
00218   if (elmt)
00219     return (elmt->ptr);
00220   else
00221     return (NULL);
00222 }
00223 
00224 StackElmt *
00225 Stack_Find (Stack * stack, void *ptr)
00226 {
00227   StackElmt *tmp = stack->top;
00228 
00229   while (tmp)
00230     {
00231       if (tmp->ptr == ptr)
00232         return (tmp);
00233       tmp = tmp->next;
00234     }
00235   return (NULL);
00236 }
00237 
00238 StackElmt *
00239 Stack_Ptr_Reset (Stack * stack)
00240 {
00241   stack->ptr = stack->top;
00242   return (stack->ptr);
00243 }
00244 
00245 void
00246 Stack_Ptr_Set (Stack * stack, StackElmt * ptr)
00247 {
00248   if (ptr)
00249     stack->ptr = ptr;
00250 }
00251 
00252 StackElmt *
00253 Stack_Find_Next (Stack * stack)
00254 {
00255   StackElmt *tmp = stack->ptr;
00256 
00257   if (tmp != NULL)
00258     {
00259       tmp = stack->ptr->next;
00260       stack->ptr = tmp;
00261     }
00262   return (tmp);
00263 }
00264 
00265 int
00266 Stack_Is_Bottom (Stack * stack)
00267 {
00268   return (stack->ptr != NULL && stack->ptr == stack->bottom);
00269 }
00270 
00271 void
00272 Delete_Stack (Stack * stack, StackElmt * ptr)
00273 {
00274   StackElmt *prev = ptr->prev;
00275   StackElmt *next = ptr->next;
00276 
00277   if (next)
00278     if (prev)
00279       {
00280         next->prev = prev;
00281         prev->next = next;
00282       }
00283     else
00284       {
00285         stack->top = next;
00286         next->prev = NULL;
00287       }
00288   else
00289     {
00290       if (prev)
00291         {
00292           prev->next = NULL;
00293           stack->bottom = prev;
00294         }
00295       else
00296         stack->top = stack->bottom = NULL;
00297 
00298     }
00299   L_free (stackElmtPool, ptr);
00300 }
00301 
00302 void
00303 Stack_Print (Stack * stack)
00304 {
00305   StackElmt *tmp = stack->top;
00306 
00307   while (tmp != NULL)
00308     {
00309 #ifdef LP64_ARCHITECTURE
00310       fprintf (stdout, " %ld", (long) tmp->ptr);
00311 #else
00312       fprintf (stdout, " %d", (int) tmp->ptr);
00313 #endif
00314       tmp = tmp->next;
00315     }
00316 }
